@java.lang.SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public class GemfireDatastore
extends AbstractDatastore

Implementation of the org.grails.datastore.mapping.core.Datastore interface that maps entities into Gemfire regions.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
